About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands


First, let me say welcome and thank you for visting my website. I hope you find it easy to navigate and comprehend.

The first 20 years of my working career were spent as a pet groomer. I studied hard and mastered the trade, eventually leading to the founding of a business.

After several years of owning and building the business, I sold it to pursue a new career path. I began learning UI/UX Designing in 2022 where my years of pay attention to the finest details gave me a leg up in mastering a new craft.

I began with HTML and CSS, moving on to SASS and . and I am currently mastering .

I'm excited to learn more in this career path and I am constantly looking for more adept methods to serve my cliens and their visions.
